bug.author: anirudhacharya
bug.description:
In the SSD example while launching the model server for inference - <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/mxnet-model-server/tree/master/examples/ssd#step-6---start-the-inference-service>https://github.com/awslabs/mxnet-model-server/tree/master/examples/ssd#step-6---start-the-inference-service</denchmark-link>
we run the following command - mxnet-model-server --models SSD=resnet50_ssd_model.model --service ssd_service.py the SSD in the command should be lower case, else while running inference it will result in HTTP 404.
